#summary Class API for Calendar from module Components
#labels Phase-Support,Deprecated

    
    
    
= Class *jplex.components.Calendar*  _extends [APIPangolincommonComponent jplex.common.Component]_  =

== Description ==
Calendar component class.
Create a navigable calendar from a text field or a button.


== Config Table ==
|| *Name* || *Default Value* || *Description* ||
|| _date_ || `new Date()` ||  The default date to select ||
|| _dest_ || `null` ||  The textfield to modify when a new date is selected ||
|| _fade_ || `0.3` ||  Time in seconds to show/hide the popup calendar ||
|| _maxDate_ || `false` ||  All dates that are above this one are not allowed ||
|| _minDate_ || `false` ||  All dates that are bellow this one are not allowed ||
|| _src_ || `null` ||  The event source, can be a textfield or a button for example ||

== Event Table ==
|| *Name* || *Description* || *Parameters* ||
|| _onSelectEvent_ ||  When a new date is selected ||   - `date <Date>`  The selected date <br/>  ||
|| _onShowEvent_ ||  When the calendar appears ||  ||

== Methods ==                                
|| *Signature* || *Return Type* || *Description* ||
|| `down()` || `void` || Navigate down in the current month, from the currently focused day. ||
|| `getValue()` || `String` || Get the selected date ||
|| `hide()` || `void` || Makes the calendar disappear, with a fade out effect if configured so ||
|| `left()` || `void` || Navigate to the left in the current month, from the currently focused day. ||
|| `next()` || `void` || Go to the next month ||
|| `previous()` || `void` || Go to the previous month ||
|| `render()` || `void` || Render the calendar for the current month ||
|| `right()` || `void` || Navigate to the right in the current month, from the currently focused day. ||
|| `select(oDate)` || `void` || Explicitly selects the oDate'th cell in the calendar ||
|| `setFocused(oItem)` || `void` || Sets the current focused item of the calendar (the one that would be selected) ||
|| `setSelected(oItem)` || `void` || Sets the current selected item of the calendar ||
|| `setValue(s)` || `void` || Sets the current value as value of the calendar field ||
|| `show()` || `void` || Makes the calendar container appear, with a fade in effect if configured so ||
|| `up()` || `void` || Navigate up in the current month, from the currently focused day. ||
